channel.title: The Postal Service
channel.description:
I just heard about them about a week ago from my friend..
Here's some of their music: [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=hMOkfI7wCrI]Such Great Heights[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=FAPy64IgG58]Sleeping In[/url] [url=http://youtube.com/watch?v=wmaEYrmrY4I]Nothing Better[/url]
They don't have any official videos, so ignore how bad the videos are.
By the way, this section should have less "Rap Vs. Rock" threads and more sharing of some good music.

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

Such Great Heights is such a trrippy song when your stoned and a bit drunk. just downloaded their discography. thanks for the good music to add.

EDIT - Just listened to the Iron and Wine cover, and it isn’t better than the original at all, lol.

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @Mopman Mopman
item.description:
@Mopman wrote:

How could they ruin it if it’s their song?

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @goatee goatee
item.description:
@goatee wrote:

Postal service ruined such great heights… they may have done it first but the Iron and Wine cover is so much better.

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:

Mushaboom (Postal serivce remix) - Best song by them…
[/quote]
Thanks for that, =], any other songs apart from their album ones out?[/quote]
uhm nope, but i <3 postal service

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Wow, thank god for this thread… I haven’t been able to stop listening to them. They are just so great. I love every single song in a different way. Sorry for grave dig much.

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service

item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

not bad. not my favorite but at least I didn’t close out of it in a second like with most music I hate.

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“Casey., post:6, topic:192014”]Heh, this would have to be one of my all time favorite bands.

The fact that they have no music videos is a shock to me, I always thought the vids for Such Great Heights was theirs.[/quote]

They have a few, I’m pretty sure Such Great Heights was theirs. When I said that I was mostly referring to Nothing Better.

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

Heh, this would have to be one of my all time favorite bands.

The fact that they have no music videos is a shock to me, I always thought the vids for Such Great Heights was theirs.

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @FastBallz FastBawlz
item.description:
@FastBallz wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:4, topic:192014”]Sorry FastBawlz I was writing a reply and MITB fucked up [That was 2 days ago] so I never got round to replying.

i have mixed feelings about them. I really enjoyed the song “Nothing Better” but all of their songs seems alike and a bit boring. Nevertheless Nothing Better is on my mind now and I’ve been listening to it a lot the past few days.

Thanks for letting me know about the band =][/quote]

Ya, Nothing Better is my favorite song too ;\ Relates to basically everyone.

Read full topic

item.title: The Postal Service
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

Sorry FastBawlz I was writing a reply and MITB fucked up [That was 2 days ago] so I never got round to replying.

i have mixed feelings about them. I really enjoyed the song “Nothing Better” but all of their songs seems alike and a bit boring. Nevertheless Nothing Better is on my mind now and I’ve been listening to it a lot the past few days.

Thanks for letting me know about the band =]

Read full topic
